cells.data:
# Selection shortcuts

`shft` Select
`shft + optn` Select block (on same line)
`shft + optn + ↕️` Copy line below/above
`shft + cmd` Select line

`optn + cmd` Multi-line select

`cmd + shft + l` Select all instances

`ctrl + space` Intellisense

`F2` Rename refactoring

`cmd + . ` Refactor via extracting

`optn + cmd + [ or ]` Code folding
